column7: Dec 6 Taiwan stocks edged up 0.2 percent on Friday
column8: paced by gains in Apple Inc supplier Largan Precision on news its November sales hit a record.     At about 45 minutes into trade
column9: the main TAIEX index  had climbed to 8
column11: with the electronics sub-index  up 0.27 percent.     Largan
column13: jumped 1 percent. It posted an 8.8 growth in November sales compared with October
